mapper.sql: id, mobile, email, password, imgUuid, nickname, sex, cityCode, realName, identityStatus, realNameStatus, educationStatus, DATE_FORMAT(createDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createDate, DATE_FORMAT(updateDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as updateDate, status, identityInfo, idCardUuidA, idCardUuidB, degreeImgUuid, diplomaImgUuid, cid, IDcard, vip, school
mapper.insert:
insert into member_info
id, mobile, email, password, imgUuid, nickname, sex, cityCode, realName, identityStatus, realNameStatus, educationStatus, createDate, updateDate, status, identityInfo, idCardUuidA, idCardUuidB, degreeImgUuid, diplomaImgUuid, cid, IDcard, vip, school,
#{id}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{password}, #{imgUuid}, #{nickname}, #{sex}, #{cityCode}, #{realName}, #{identityStatus}, #{realNameStatus}, #{educationStatus}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{status}, #{identityInfo}, #{idCardUuidA}, #{idCardUuidB}, #{degreeImgUuid}, #{diplomaImgUuid}, #{cid}, #{IDcard}, #{vip}, #{school},
mapper.select: select from ( select from member_info where mobile = #{account} and password = #{password} union all select from member_info where email = #{account} and password = #{password}) t

delete from member_info where id in
#{idList}
mapper.update:
update member_info
id=#{id}, mobile=#{mobile}, email=#{email}, password=#{password}, imgUuid=#{imgUuid}, nickname=#{nickname}, sex=#{sex}, cityCode=#{cityCode}, realName=#{realName}, identityStatus=#{identityStatus}, realNameStatus=#{realNameStatus}, educationStatus=#{educationStatus}, createDate=#{createDate}, updateDate=#{updateDate}, status=#{status}, identityInfo=#{identityInfo}, idCardUuidA=#{idCardUuidA}, idCardUuidB=#{idCardUuidB}, degreeImgUuid=#{degreeImgUuid}, diplomaImgUuid=#{diplomaImgUuid}, cid=#{cid}, IDcard=#{IDcard}, vip=#{vip}, school=#{school},
where id in
#{idList}
